alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 130 PM EDT/1230 PM CDT/... At 1259 PM EDT/1159 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Blountstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Altha, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Red Oak, Ocheesee, Selman, Chason, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Kennys Mill, Center Lake, Willis, Nettle Ridge, Blountstown Airport, Macedonia, Torreya State Park and Durham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
